alert.note: Alert for Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:43PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Graham County through 530 PM MST... At 443 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over San Carlos, or 19 miles east of Globe. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly remote areas of west central Graham County. This includes Route 70 between mile markers 272 and 281. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford
